# Loading Packages

```{r message = F, warning = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidylog)
```

# Loading Data

```{r}
grad_race_household <- read_csv("../data/grad_race_household.csv")
grad_race_household_pcts <- grad_race_household %>% 
    select(-ends_with("moe")) %>%
    select(dist, grad_rate_midpt, children, starts_with("pct"))
grad_race_household_pcts %>% 
    names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(grad_race_household_pcts, 
       aes(x = pct_native, y = grad_rate_midpt)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = T)

lm(grad_rate_midpt ~ . - school_ID:children, data = grad_race_household_pcts)
```
